name: lunar-dance
caption: Lunar Dance

effect.short: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
effect.full: User [faint]{mechanic:faint}s.  Its replacement's [HP]{mechanic:hp} and [PP]{mechanic:pp} are fully restored, and any [major status effect]{mechanic:major-status-effect} is removed.

flavorText:
The user faints. In return, the Pok√©mon taking its
place will have its status and HP fully restored.
